channel.title: Project Platonic [Updated]
channel.description:
[u][i][b]Introduction:[/b][/i][/u] [center] Hi, I'm looking to start a private server and was looking for people who were interested in helping me code and get the server going. [/center]
[u][i][b]About the server:[/b][/i][/u] [center]The server that I would like a team to help me with is going to be a hard and long one. I want to create a perfect economy server, where rares are actually rare. Where everything is working. It will be unique and creative! I would like help in coding the server correctly and well![/center]
[u][i][b]The Team:[/b][/i][/u][center] Server Programmers[/center] [center]Platonic[/center] [center]~Open~[/center] [center]Client Developers[/center] [center]~Open~[/center] [center]~Open~[/center]
[center]Might add more spots on the team if needed.[/center]
[u][i][b]Base:[/b][/i][/u] [center]Looking to use a 317 source, the base can be decided between the developers/Team[/center]
[u][i][b]My Information:[/b][/i][/u] [center]Add me on Skype if your interested and or would like further details - ProjectPlatonic[/center]
